metadata.title: CVE-2009-4193 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Merkaartor 0.14 allows local users to append data to arbitrary files via asymlink attack on the /tmp/merkaartor.log temporary file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-4193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

merkaartor - 0.14+svnfixes20090912-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: merkaartor package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.14+svnfixes20090912-2').
